Pre-Game Insights: The Mets look to keep their momentum going Sunday against the Philadelphia Phillies in Game 2 of the National League Division Series.
If the Mets can pull off another win, they would take a 2-0 lead in this best-of-five series.
The winner advances to the National League Championship Series.
It won't be easy to defeat the Phillies again at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia.
Others: The Mets and Phillies will broadcast nationally on FS1 for Game 2 of their NL Division Series.
Game 2: Mets at Phillies, 4:08 p.m. Sunday, FS1
Game 3: Phillies at Mets, TBD Tuesday, FS1
Game 4, if necessary: Phillies at Mets, TBD Wednesday, FS1
Game 5, if necessary: Mets at Phillies, TBD Friday, FS1
